Typealiases.html#/s:6Appudo10AsyncDelaya.name: AsyncDelay
Typealiases.html#/s:6Appudo10AsyncDelaya.abstract: An AsyncDelay can delay execution of code to a time where at least the specified milliseconds have passed.

Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:6Appudo10Sett.name: value
Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:6Appudo10Sett.abstract: Get the value of the setting as String.

Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:6Appudo10Sett.name: isValid
Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:6Appudo10Sett.abstract: Check if there was an error parsing the setting.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.name: errorMsg
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.abstract: Returns the error message for a failed async.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.name: isReady
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.abstract: Returns true if the async has finished.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.name: hasError
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.abstract: Returns true if the async has an error.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.name: waitFor()
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.abstract: Block until the async has finished and return the error state.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.name: errorValue
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:6Appudo10Asyn.abstract: Returns the error value of the async.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV7heade.name: headers
Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV7heade.abstract: The headers to send with the mail.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV11atta.name: attachments
Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV11atta.abstract: The files to send with the mail.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4fromA.name: from(_:_:)
Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4fromA.abstract: A Mail must be created with a sender domain to prevent spam.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4sendA.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4sendA.abstract: Send a mail with a String body.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4sendA.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/Mail.html#/s:6Appudo4MailV4sendA.abstract: Send a mail with data from a Link as body.

Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:6Appudo12Us.name: numGroups
Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:6Appudo12Us.abstract: Returns number of groups for this user.

Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:6Appudo12Us.name: getGroupAt(_:)
Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:6Appudo12Us.abstract: Returns the users group at a given index.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6updat.name: update(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6updat.abstract: Update the current login user before the login expires. Logins can be set to automatically expire after a time period.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6remov.name: remove(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6remov.abstract: Remove a user from the current account by it’s unique name.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8regis.name: register(_:_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8regis.abstract: Register a user with a unique name and password to get a ticket.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV3addAA.name: add(_:_:_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV3addAA.abstract: Add a new user to the current account.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV3getAA.name: get(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV3getAA.abstract: Get a user from the current account by it’s unique name.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV5login.name: login(_:_:_:_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV5login.abstract: Login as a user. This will logout a current user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV5owner.name: owner
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV5owner.abstract: Returns the owner user id for the current run.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9login.name: loginHash
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9login.abstract: Returns the login hash for the current login session.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4dataS.name: data
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4dataS.abstract: Returns the custom data value of the current login user or nil if there is no login.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV2idAA0.name: id
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV2idAA0.abstract: Returns the unique id of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4nameS.name: name
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4nameS.abstract: Returns the unique name of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6activ.name: active
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6activ.abstract: Returns true if the user is active.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV7expir.name: expired
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV7expir.abstract: Returns true if the login of the user has expired.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9lastL.name: lastLogin
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9lastL.abstract: Returns the time of the last login of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4infoA.name: info
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV4infoA.abstract: Returns the UserID and GroupID for the current user and group owning the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.name: setOwner(_:_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.abstract: Set the owning user and group for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.abstract: Set the owning user for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8setOw.abstract: Set the owning group for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6remov.name: remove()
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV6remov.abstract: Remove the user from the current account.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV11setP.name: setPassword(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV11setP.abstract: Set a new password for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9setAc.name: setActive(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9setAc.abstract: Set the active property for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8hasGr.name: hasGroup(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8hasGr.abstract: Check if the user is a member of the group.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8addGr.name: addGroup(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV8addGr.abstract: Add the user as a member of the group.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV11remo.name: removeGroup(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV11remo.abstract: Remove the user as a member of the group.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9listO.name: listOwned(_:order:chunkLimit:withGroups:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9listO.abstract: Get the list of users owned by a user.

Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9listO.name: listOwned(_:order:chunkLimit:withGroups:)
Structs/User.html#/s:6Appudo4UserV9listO.abstract: Get the list of users owned by a group.

Structs/UserID.html#/s:6Appudo6UserIDV8r.name: rawValue
Structs/UserID.html#/s:6Appudo6UserIDV8r.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique user id.

Structs/UserID.html#/s:6Appudo6UserIDV5v.name: value
Structs/UserID.html#/s:6Appudo6UserIDV5v.abstract: Returns the user for the unique user id.

Structs/FileItem/Flag.html.name: Flag
Structs/FileItem/Flag.html.abstract: Flag contains the mode used to open a file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/RenameFlags.html.name: RenameFlags
Structs/FileItem/RenameFlags.html.abstract: RenameFlags contains the mode used to rename a file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/MKPathFlags.html.name: MKPathFlags
Structs/FileItem/MKPathFlags.html.abstract: MKPathFlags contains the mode used to create a directory path.

Structs/FileItem/Mode.html.name: Mode
Structs/FileItem/Mode.html.abstract: Mode contains the access rights of a file or directory for its user or group owner.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: create_dev(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Create a run device file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: isRoot
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is a root directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: isOpen
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is an open file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: name
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns the name of the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: path
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns the full path of the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: stat
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns the FileStat holding information about the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: stat_open
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns the FileStat holding information about the open file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: data
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns the data of the file as FileBob.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: getView(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns a view of the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: setMode(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Set the current access mode for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: setOwner(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Set the owning user and group for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Set the owning user for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Set the owning group for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: listDir(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Get a list for the contents of a directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: close()
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Close the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/AccessMode.html.name: AccessMode
Structs/FileItem/AccessMode.html.abstract: AccessMode contains the access modes of a file or directory to use with access.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: access(_:mode:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Returns true if the file or directory exists and the current login user has ownership and rights for access.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: seek(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Set or get the current file position.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: open(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Open the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: open(_:_:_:emptyPath:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Open a path relative to the directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: mkpath(_:_:flags:emptyPath:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Create directories relative to the directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: rename(_:_:flags:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Rename the file or directory. The FileItem is updated with an empty path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: link(_:_:hard:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Link the file or directory to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: link_open(_:_:hard:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Link the file or directory to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: copy(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Copy the file to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: remove(_:outer:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Remove the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: write(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Write data to the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: append(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Append data to the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Zero copy data to a FileSeekable target.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: truncate_open(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Truncate the open file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: truncate(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Truncate the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: readAsText(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Read the file as String.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.name: readAsArray(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:6Appudo8FileIte.abstract: Read the file as ContiguousArray.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: isFileNotDir
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is a file and not a directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: time_latest
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the latest of change and modification time.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: time_access
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the time the file was last read (access time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: time_mod
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the time of file’s last content modification. (modification time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: time_state
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the time of file’s last meta data change. (change time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: uid
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the UserID for the current user owning the file or directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: gid
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Returns the GroupID for the current group owning the file or directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.name: mode
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:6Appudo8FileSta.abstract: Return the access mode for the current user and group owner.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.name: SEEK_SET
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.abstract: Use this flag to set the current position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.name: SEEK_CUR
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.abstract: Use this flag to get the current position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.name: SEEK_END
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.abstract: Use this flag to get the maximum position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.name: SEEK_DATA
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.abstract: Use this flag to move the current position to the next data.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.name: SEEK_HOLE
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:6Appudo12Fi.abstract: Use this flag to move the current position to the next hole.

Structs/StaticDomain.html#/s:6Appudo12St.name: id
Structs/StaticDomain.html#/s:6Appudo12St.abstract: Returns the unique id for the host.

Structs/Account.html#/s:6Appudo7AccountV.name: get(_:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:6Appudo7AccountV.abstract: Get an existing account by its unique name.

Structs/Account.html#/s:6Appudo7AccountV.abstract: Remove an existing account by its unique name.

Structs/Account.html#/s:6Appudo7AccountV.abstract: Returns the current account id executing the run.

Structs/Account.html#/s:6Appudo7AccountV.abstract: Returns true if the account is active.

Structs/AccountID.html#/s:6Appudo9Accoun.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/AccountID.html#/s:6Appudo9Accoun.name: value
Structs/AccountID.html#/s:6Appudo9Accoun.abstract: Returns the account for the unique account id.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV2idA.abstract: Returns the unique id of the group.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV6act.name: active
Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV6act.abstract: Returns true if the group is active.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV4inf.name: info
Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV4inf.abstract: Returns the UserID and GroupID for the current user and group owning the group.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV8set.abstract: Set the owning group for the group.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV9set.name: setActive(_:)
Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV9set.abstract: Set the active property for the group.

Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV6rem.name: remove()
Structs/Group.html#/s:6Appudo5GroupV6rem.abstract: Remove the group from the current account.

Structs/GroupID.html#/s:6Appudo7GroupIDV.name: rawValue
Structs/GroupID.html#/s:6Appudo7GroupIDV.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/Page.html#/s:6Appudo4PageV2idSiv.name: id
Structs/Page.html#/s:6Appudo4PageV2idSiv.abstract: Returns the unique id of the page.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:6Appudo11SQL.name: string
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:6Appudo11SQL.abstract: Return the query result value as String.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:6Appudo11SQL.name: bool
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:6Appudo11SQL.abstract: Return a query result value as Bool.

Structs/Link.html#/s:6Appudo4LinkV6toPag.name: toPage(_:)
Structs/Link.html#/s:6Appudo4LinkV6toPag.abstract: Create a link to a page run in the run tree.

Structs/Link.html#/s:6Appudo4LinkV6toFil.abstract: Create a link to a file accessible by the run.

Structs/Link.html#/s:6Appudo4LinkV5toUrl.abstract: Create a link to a custom url.

Structs/Link.html#/s:6Appudo4LinkV8toStr.abstract: Returns the link as a String to print.

Structs/ErrorEvent.html.name: ErrorEvent
Structs/ErrorEvent.html.abstract: A run receives ErrorEvent items on errors.

Structs/MenuItem.html.name: MenuItem
Structs/MenuItem.html.abstract: The MenuItem is used to walk and access the ordered pages of the run tree.

Structs/Memory.html.name: Memory
Structs/Memory.html.abstract: Memory provides information about the used and maximum memory of the current run.

Structs/Domain.html.name: Domain
Structs/Domain.html.abstract: For each registered domain there is a property with the domain name in the Domain struct.

Structs/Setting.html.name: Setting
Structs/Setting.html.abstract: For each registered setting there is a property with the setting name in the Setting struct.

Structs/Dir.html.name: Dir

Structs/Role.html.name: Role
Structs/Role.html.abstract: For each registered role there is a property with the role name in the Role struct.

Structs.html#/s:6Appudo8FileViewV.name: FileView
Structs.html#/s:6Appudo8FileViewV.abstract: The FileView is used to hand over a partial view of a file to other APIs.

Structs/Link.html.name: Link
Structs/Link.html.abstract: Link is used to get and modify http links to different target types.

Structs/Socket.html.name: Socket
Structs/Socket.html.abstract: A single connection to a run is managed with a Socket.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html.name: SQLQryValue
Structs/SQLQryValue.html.abstract: SQLQryValue holds a single SQLQry result value.

Structs/Page.html.name: Page
Structs/Page.html.abstract: A single page run from the run tree is represented by a Page.

Structs.html#/s:6Appudo9GroupInfoV.name: GroupInfo
Structs.html#/s:6Appudo9GroupInfoV.abstract: GroupInfo holds the owning user and group of a group.

Structs/GroupID.html.name: GroupID
Structs/GroupID.html.abstract: GroupID holds a group’s unique id. Other APIs can accept GroupIDs to modify group ownership.

Structs/Group.html.name: Group
Structs/Group.html.abstract: Single groups are added, modified or removed with a Group.

Structs/AccountID.html.name: AccountID
Structs/AccountID.html.abstract: AccountID holds an account’s unique id. Other APIs can accept AccountIDs.

Structs/Account.html.name: Account
Structs/Account.html.abstract: Single accounts are added, updated and removed with an Account. Appudo is a multi account system where each account has multiple users. An Account can have multiple domains to access its runs. To use this API the user of the current login must be in the master group.

Structs/StaticDomain.html.name: StaticDomain
Structs/StaticDomain.html.abstract: Each host of an account is identified by a StaticDomain.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html.name: FileSeekFlag
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html.abstract: The FileSeekFlag is used for the FileSeekable API.

Structs/FileStat.html.name: FileStat
Structs/FileStat.html.abstract: Information about a file like the size or ownership is accessed with a FileStat.

Structs/FileItem.html.name: FileItem
Structs/FileItem.html.abstract: A single file or directory is modified with a FileItem.

Structs.html#/s:6Appudo8UserInfoV.name: UserInfo
Structs.html#/s:6Appudo8UserInfoV.abstract: UserInfo holds the owning user and group of a user.

Structs/UserID.html.name: UserID
Structs/UserID.html.abstract: UserID holds a user’s unique id. Other APIs can accept UserIDs to modify user ownership.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: Single users are added, modified or removed with a User.

Structs/UserListItem.html.name: UserListItem
Structs/UserListItem.html.abstract: UserListItem represents a single item in a UserList.

Structs/AsyncValue.html.name: AsyncValue
Structs/AsyncValue.html.abstract: AsyncValue is the common return type for async APIs.

Structs/SettingVar.html.name: SettingVar
Structs/SettingVar.html.abstract: Single setting values are accessed or updated with a SettingVar.

Structs.html#/s:6Appudo6MemVarV.name: MemVar
Structs.html#/s:6Appudo6MemVarV.abstract: Memory variables are accessed and updated with a MemVar.

Protocols/Blob.html#/s:6Appudo4BlobP5sli.name: slice(_:_:)
Protocols/Blob.html#/s:6Appudo4BlobP5sli.abstract: Create a new Blob as a segment of the parent.

Protocols/FileSendSource.html#/s:6Appudo.name: send(_:_:_:)
Protocols/FileSendSource.html#/s:6Appudo.abstract: Zero copy data to a FileSeekable target.

Protocols/FileLockable.html#/s:6Appudo12.name: isLocked(_:_:)
Protocols/FileLockable.html#/s:6Appudo12.abstract: Check if there is a lock in range.

Protocols/FileLockable.html.name: FileLockable
Protocols/FileLockable.html.abstract: FileLockable represents a lockable file to serialize reads and writes.

Protocols/FileSeekable.html.name: FileSeekable
Protocols/FileSeekable.html.abstract: FileSeekable represents a file that is seekable.

Protocols.html#/s:6Appudo15DataWriteSour.name: DataWriteSource
Protocols.html#/s:6Appudo15DataWriteSour.abstract: DataWriteSource represents a data item that can be used with the file write APIs.

Protocols/FileSendSource.html.name: FileSendSource
Protocols/FileSendSource.html.abstract: FileSendSource represents a file that supports zero copy.

Protocols/Blob.html.name: Blob
Protocols/Blob.html.abstract: A Blob is the read only representation of raw data used by other APIs to hand over data.

Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortASCs.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortASCs.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for directory listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortDSCs.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortDSCs.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for directory listings with descending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortASCs.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortASCs.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for user listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortDSCs.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:6Appudo12AlphasortDSCs.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for user listings with descending alphabetical order.

Functions/<!(_:).html.abstract: Wait until the async has finished. Aka await.

Functions.html#/s:6Appudo2lqopSbyycF.abstract: Schedule a function or closure to call it later.

Functions/<?(_:_:).html.abstract: Schedule a function or closure to call it later when the async has finished.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: format0
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: A basic format to parse and print Date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: format1
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: A basic format to parse and print Date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: fromIntervalSince1970(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Get a Data from a time interval sine 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970.

Enums/AppudoError.html#/s:6Appudo0A5Erro.name: text
Enums/AppudoError.html#/s:6Appudo0A5Erro.abstract: Returns the string message for the error.

Enums/SQLQryError.html#/s:6Appudo11SQLQr.name: errMsg
Enums/SQLQryError.html#/s:6Appudo11SQLQr.abstract: Returns the String message for the error.

Enums.html#/s:6Appudo14ErrorEventTypeO.name: ErrorEventType
Enums.html#/s:6Appudo14ErrorEventTypeO.abstract: ErrorEventType holds the different types of error events.

Enums.html#/s:6Appudo8LinkTypeO.name: LinkType
Enums.html#/s:6Appudo8LinkTypeO.abstract: LinkType contains the type of the Link pointing to.

Enums/SQLQryError.html.name: SQLQryError
Enums/SQLQryError.html.abstract: SQLQryError contains the error for an SQLQry.

Enums.html#/s:6Appudo15HTTPRequestTypeO.name: HTTPRequestType
Enums.html#/s:6Appudo15HTTPRequestTypeO.abstract: HTTPRequestType contains the type of a http request.

Enums/AppudoError.html.name: AppudoError
Enums/AppudoError.html.abstract: AppudoError holds the numeric error values and their string representations.

Enums.html#/s:6Appudo4LangO.name: Lang
Enums.html#/s:6Appudo4LangO.abstract: Lang contains possible values for user languages.

Classes/DataBlob.html#/s:6Appudo8DataBlo.name: slice(_:_:)
Classes/DataBlob.html#/s:6Appudo8DataBlo.abstract: Create a new Blob as a segment of the parent.

Classes/Async.html#/s:6Appudo5AsyncC3any.name: any()
Classes/Async.html#/s:6Appudo5AsyncC3any.abstract: Block until any or all asyncs have finished and return one if any.

Classes/Async.html#/s:6Appudo5AsyncC5lat.name: later()
Classes/Async.html#/s:6Appudo5AsyncC5lat.abstract: Run all functions to call later that do not depend on an async.

Classes/HTTPClient/HTTPVersion.html.name: HTTPVersion
Classes/HTTPClient/HTTPVersion.html.abstract: HTTPVersion contains the HTTP versions useable with the HTTPClient.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: get(_:_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: POST(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a POST request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: GET(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a GET request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: DELETE(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a DELETE request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: close()
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Close the current connection to the peer.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: connect(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Create a keep alive connection to a peer with a link.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: send(_:removeEncoding:updateHeaders:updateCookies:httpVersion:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Send an HTTP request to the target with optional body data.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: postFiles
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get and set the files to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: cookies
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get and set the cookies to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: headers
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get and set additional headers to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: encoding
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get and set the encoding to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: isSSL
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Returns true if the target is using the ssl protocol.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: type
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Get and set the request type for the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: isPending
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Returns true if the current request has not finished.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: hasError
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Returns true if the request has failed.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.name: bodyData
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:6Appudo10HTTP.abstract: Returns the body data as an unlinked file.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryCAC.name: init(_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryCAC.abstract: Create an SQLQry instance. For security reasons the query string must be statically known at compile time.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC13.name: inTransaction
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC13.abstract: Returns true if there is an open transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC5b.name: begin()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC5b.abstract: Start a new transaction. There must not be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC3e.name: end()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC3e.abstract: End the current transaction. There must be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8r.name: rollback()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8r.abstract: Rollback the current transaction. There must be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9i.name: isPending
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9i.abstract: Returns true if the current query has not finished.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC6v.name: values
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC6v.abstract: Get and set the values used for the query.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC4e.name: exec()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC4e.abstract: Execute the query and receive the results.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC3g.name: get(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC3g.abstract: Return a query result value as SQLQryValue.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9g.name: getAsText(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9g.abstract: Return a query result value as String.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8g.name: getAsInt(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8g.abstract: Return a query result value as Int.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9g.name: getAsBool(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC9g.abstract: Return a query result value as Bool.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7c.name: colName(_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7c.abstract: Return a column name of the query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC10.name: nativeMode
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC10.abstract: Set to true to use the native mode for the query. In non native mode it is only possible to get result values as String.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7n.name: numRows
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7n.abstract: Returns the number of rows for the current query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7n.name: numCols
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7n.abstract: Returns the number of columns for the current query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7e.name: errCode
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC7e.abstract: Returns the error for the current query.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8h.name: hasError
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC8h.abstract: Returns true if the query has failed.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC6e.name: errMsg
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:6Appudo6SQLQryC6e.abstract: Returns the error message for the current query.

Classes/SQLQry.html.name: SQLQry
Classes/SQLQry.html.abstract: SQLQry is used to access database tables registered with the run.

Classes/HTTPClient.html.name: HTTPClient
Classes/HTTPClient.html.abstract: HTTPClient is used to transfer data to and from internal or external REST APIs with the http protocol.

Classes/FileItemList.html.name: FileItemList
Classes/FileItemList.html.abstract: FileItemList is a chunked list representation for directory listings.

Classes/UserList.html.name: UserList
Classes/UserList.html.abstract: UserList is a chunked list representation for user listings.

Classes/Async.html.name: Async
Classes/Async.html.abstract: Most of the APIs of Appudo are async. There are multiple data structures for the async handling.

Classes/DataBlob.html.name: DataBlob
Classes/DataBlob.html.abstract: A DataBlob is used to hand over binary data to other APIs. The websocket run accepts data blobs to send bytes.
